title: Web Design for Shiny Devs
text: Website design and development is one of the most critical factors contributing to whether the user has a good or poor experience while browsing your site, directly influencing the overall impression of your brand. By exposing you to common governing rules of design, this course will walk you through the entire design process, from ideation to execution. These rules will help you to become a better collaborator to design teams, and enable you to create beautiful front-end experiences.

title: Web Design for Shiny Devs
text:
Is This Workshop for Me?

This workshop will be appropriate for attendees who answer yes to these questions:



Do you want to gain confidence in app design?



Do you want to quickly test new business ideas?



Do you want your website to reach more clients?

title: Web Design for Shiny Devs
text:
Overview
Website design and development is one of the most critical factors contributing to whether the user has a good or poor experience while browsing your site, directly influencing the overall impression of your brand. By exposing you to common governing rules of design, this course will walk you through the entire design process, from ideation to execution. These rules will help you to become a better collaborator to design teams, and enable you to create beautiful front-end experiences.


Is this workshop for me?

This workshop will be appropriate for attendees who answer yes to these questions:



Do you want to gain confidence in your app design?




Do you want to quickly iterate and test new business ideas?




Do you want your website to reach more clients and make an impact?
